before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"4sn3d","text":"A major consideration to make is whether the specimen are appropriate for the bleach pre-wash step. We have found that samples with low (\u003c2%) endogenous DNA from other extraction protocols do not usually show improved endogenous values with this approach and can often decrease. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dtta","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4n2rf","text":"If a sample is particularly important, old, or comes from a site/region without prior aDNA results (to provide a reference for DNA preservation), you should consider also utilizing a non-bleach wash protocol. Additionally, take care to retain the BEDTA (EDTA used in bone wash prior to extraction), which may retain endogenous DNA molecules and can be themselves extracted for DNA library construction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9u70","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"baa1s","text":"Finally, DNA libraries produced from DNA extracts of this method frequently have lower DNA concentrations than non-bleach wash protocols. Libraries may require additional cycles of amplification in PCR steps to reach sequencing concentrations., which may impact duplication rates on sequencing. To improve molecular diversity in the final sequencing data, consider:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"656us","text":"-increasing the number of individual PCRs per sample when sequencing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhqql","text":"-increasing the amount the DNA used in library construction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l7ou","text":"-increasing the amount of dsDNA library used in amplifcation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q9t5","text":"-performing duplicate extractions of the same bone powder specimen, to increase the number of amount of DNA available for above","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4tl2p","text":"This protocol describes the steps to extraction degraded DNA molecules from ancient or historic bone and teeth powder, first washing the powder with dilute bleach (0.5% sodium hypochlorite) to improve the retrieval of endogenous DNA molecules. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5do9f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7241l","text":"It is an implementation of the bleach washes reported in (Boessenkool et al, 2017) and (Dabney et al, 2019),  combined with elements of the extraction protocols described by (Yang et al, 1998), (MacHugh et al, 2000), and (Gamba et al, 2014).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"73tl4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcjcs","text":"We combine the low g centrifugation steps described in (Rohland et al, 2018), and the use of a low pH modified PB buffer used in (Allentoft et al, 2015). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"287os","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ta8c","text":"Within our group, we typically construct double stranded (dsDNA) libraries from the DNA extract, as per (Meyer and Kircher, 2010).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Ancient DNA, extraction, DNA extraction, degraded DNA
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"bto7q","text":"Sodium Hypochlorite (14%, dilute to 0.5%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12utt","text":"Water (Laboratory grade)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fld9u","text":"EDTA (0.5M, pH 8)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dp493","text":"Tris-HCl (1M, pH 7.4)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12lmv","text":"Sodium acetate (3M, pH 5.2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79mir","text":"Sodium Chloride (5M)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bgvr","text":"N-Lauroylsarcosine ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7rvf","text":"Proteinase K (2.5 U/mg or 50U/mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15j25","text":"Tween (20%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rrbo","text":"Qiagen PB, PE, and EB Buffers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epd7u","text":"EBT buffer: 7.5 ul of 20% Tween in 15ml EB buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbfjf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9gn6","text":"1.5 ml Eppendorf tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rrj1","text":"Parafilm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jc9s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2n4hs","text":"Thermomixer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdf62","text":"Standard bench centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bg73a","text":"Bench centrifuge with a swing bucket rotor for 50ml tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ein0","text":"Optional: Incubated tube rotator, H2020 Plus (Benchmark Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"t63e","text":"Add   of   sodium hypochlorite solution to each sample tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2asei","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"990","error":false,"guid":"7153EBD0E59011EDA83AB50A8467F9BA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"9B17E840E59011EDA83AB50A8467F9BA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"84sod","text":"Vortex and incubate at   for   a rotator  (H2020plus Incubated tube rotator from Benchmark Scientific, speed 35) or in thermomixer at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":134,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"al96l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A805C510E59D11EDB4F6AB41711B1033","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"B7024980E59D11EDB4F6AB41711B1033","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E2C60D90E59D11EDB4F6AB41711B1033","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"900","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bckq0","text":"Using a bench centrifuge, spin down the tubes until the centrifuge reaches maximum speed    /  , then stop the centrifuge. Remove sample tubes from the centrifuge and discard the supernatant using a pipette, taking care to avoid disturbing the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":90,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"53kd8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"12B5A100E59E11EDB4F6AB41711B1033","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"17000","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1F451D10E59E11EDB4F6AB41711B1033","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ff63","text":"To each tube, add    of pre-UVed, labratory-grade water. Briefly vortex each tube, ensuring the bone powder pellet goes into solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1sf6o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"CCCBB890E59E11EDA58397C2E9E292AB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33hvi","text":"Using a bench centrifuge, spin down the tubes until the centrifuge reaches maximum speed    /  , then stop the centrifuge. Remove sample tubes from the centrifuge and discard the supernatant using a pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":90,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9CFFF99AE59D11EDBF7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"17000","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9CFFFB79E59D11EDBF7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"17000","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ktcj","text":"Repeat the previous two steps twice (1ml water, vortexing, spin down, removal of supernatant: a total of 3 times).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57h5k","text":"Add   of UVed EDTA   to each bone powder tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ch60","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"990","error":false,"guid":"F3695CD0E5A011EDA58397C2E9E292AB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"0EE9EBA0E5A111EDA58397C2E9E292AB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":22}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"849vm","text":"Briefly vortex to ensure the powder enters solution, then incubate on a thermomixer    (or rotor speed 20 using H2020plus Incubated tube rotator from Benchmark Scientific). At 10 minute intervals, pause the thermomixer and briefly vortex each sample tube (not required if on rotor).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cjp96","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"515C9230E5A111EDA58397C2E9E292AB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"900","start":null,"temperature":"37","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7q1pv","text":"Using a bench centrifuge, spin down the tubes until the centrifuge reaches maximum speed    /  , then stop the centrifuge. Carefully transfer the EDTA supernatant to new tubes without disturbing the pellet, with each tube labeled with \"sample-BEDTAx\", where x is the number of bleach extractions performed (e.g. first extraction for sample X, \"sampleX-BEDTA1\" ). Freeze the BEDTA tubes; these can be used to recover DNA if the final extract gives very low endogenous.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":90,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9EA16F36E5A211EDBF7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"17000","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9EA1706CE5A211EDBF7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"17000","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7http","text":"To recover DNA from the BEDTA aliquots, incubate    after adding the remaining components of the extraction buffer (see below) directly to the EDTA. Then follow the instruction for Extraction Day 2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bhef8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BC0AB910E5A411EDA58397C2E9E292AB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"900","start":null,"temperature":"37","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ivsp","text":"If the extraction buffer has not already been prepared, prepare it now. Take care to add proteinase after the rest of the buffer components have been combined and exposed to UV light for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97pk4","text":"Add    of extraction buffer (containing proteinase K) to each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"94pip","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"990","error":false,"guid":"08121570E5A911EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2bh5","text":"Cover each tube in parafilm and vortex until the bone pellet is completely in solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"al5gn","text":"Incubate   using a thermomixer   (or   on rotor speed 18 H2020plus Incubated tube rotator from Benchmark Scientific).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4vcqg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"5F5F7AC0E5A911EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":" (15-24h)","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9C44ED30E5A911EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"900","start":null,"temperature":"37","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1F2E6310E90711ED90198D5179590696","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fss3","text":"Remove each tube from incubation, then spin each sample tube using a bench centrifuge for   (10min) at max speed   /  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":90,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":113,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":117,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d32sr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"F04E4B10E5A911EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BAFF2330E5A911EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"17000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D0CDB7D0E5A911EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rekg","text":"Add    of   to each silica filter and collection  column. Spin the columns for   (1 min,  ). Discard the flow-through. Repeat for a total of 2 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":79,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":89,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"251jj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"750","error":false,"guid":"4CBE17F0E5AE11EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":4562,"mol_weight":0,"name":"PE buffer ","linfor":"","url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/shop/lab-basics/buffers-and-reagents/buffer-pe/","sku":"19065","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"58FB5550E5AE11EDB7DB753B4360A668","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":25,"name":"Qiagen","link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D116E424E5AC11EDBF7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"3":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"6000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D116E243E5AC11EDBF7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bt5qj","text":"Dry-spin the columns for   (1 min,  ). Place each column in a fresh    labeled collection Eppendorf tube. {"blocks":[{"key":"f6d0i","text":"Using a pipette, add   of EBT (see material) to the filter of each spin column. Wait   (2 min), and spin down columns at maximum speed   /  . Collection tube lids should be angled away from the direction of spin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":135,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":139,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"audo5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dv7m6","text":"Repeat this step for a total of two spins and   elution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"E7978310E5AE11EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"0F136440E5AF11EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"93A488D6E5AD11EDBF7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"3":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"17000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"93A48AC7E5AD11EDBF7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"3D643BD0E5AF11EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5v0d","text":"Sample tubes containing the purified DNA extract should be stored in a   freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ltl1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"54D62030E5AF11EDB7DB753B4360A668","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"218mj","text":"In advance of extraction, ensure sufficient labratory-grade water ( n x   , where n is the number of samples and controls plus one) and   EDTA ( n x  , where n is the number of samples and controls plus one) are subject to    UV light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":68,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":82,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":145,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":136,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":149,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":223,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9q4ej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"E5790DB0E59F11EDA58397C2E9E292AB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"9E7E1FE0E59F11EDA58397C2E9E292AB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":22}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"7EBF5C96E59E11EDBF7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"CE0A3690E59F11EDA58397C2E9E292AB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43s34","text":"Using a pH strip, check that the modified PB buffer is 5-5.5 pH. If not, increase the amount of sodium acetate and sodium chloride.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2a1e","text":"Label an appropriate number (1 per sample tube) of Roche High Pure Extender Assembly spin columns ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7rt4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":469741,"mol_weight":0,"name":"High Pure Viral Nucleic Acid Large Volume Kit","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"05114403001","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"97DB1880E5AB11EDB7DB753B4360A668","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":66,"name":"Roche","link":"http://www.roche.com/","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dn1uu","text":"The remaining pellet, if any, can be frozen or used for a second round of extraction starting from the extraction buffer addition in the previous day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"g88q","text":"Check that all liquid is gone through. If liquid is still present, spin for one more min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hkmd","text":"Prior to extraction, prepare sample tubes and controls. Per sample, 80-120 mg of bone powder should be stored in   Eppendorf tubes. Prepare an additional empty tube as an extraction control. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":68,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":113,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"93b6l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8er0i","text":"Due to the limitations of the bench centrifuge required to spin down the high volume columns (see below), a maximum of 16 samples + controls are extracted per batch.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8g0g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"0867E110E66E11ED8729958D65A87034","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

title: Bleach extraction protocol: damaged or degraded DNA recovery from bone or tooth powder.

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"3h2fl","text":"The described protocol should be performed in dedicated ancient DNA facilities. Workers should wear full-body PPE (gloves x2, body suits, masks) to avoid contamination of material. Extra care must be made to avoid cross-contamination of low concentration material typical of ancient/historical DNA projects.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
